name: Veggie Bros
description: Veggie Bros is a 2-person coop beat-em-up with rouglike and RPG elements. You play as one of the two charakters, Broko Lee or Blumen Cole and have to fight your way trough hordes of vegan zombies a.k.a. "Vombies". Both charakters have unique abilitys and can equip different item types (weapons, armor, etc.) as they progress through the game to have a better chance against the final Boss. The level, items, shops and enemys are procedurally generated to have a differnt experience every time. Controller usage is recommended.
